title: How much Internet Data does a 30 minutes game uses?
body: I just moved out and I have a sort of restricted internet connexion, I would like to know how much data a single 30 minutes game consumes to avoid burning my internet access in a single game.

replies.body: On average, a game can typically use around 40 mb of data if you're on a hard cap. It does vary widely from game to game of course.

haha i know exactly what you are talking about my man! you are probably playing with mobile hotspot. i know that, i did it too. first of, dont do it. cause league is addicting and you will want to play more, and use sooooo much data and the bills will get high !
BUT
if you wanna do it, 1GB of Internet data will last around 4 hours give or take .

Broporo's answer is correct, but also incorrect bro. Because you have to factor in other programs using internet. For exemple Firefox , Skype, Facebook, your mobile that gives you the hotspot, etc etc . and believe me i know exactly what i am talking about. Did it for like 2 and a half months. 

But as i said, if you can avoid using your mobile hotspot ( if you are of course using it for internet, if not then disregard that sentence ) avoid it. or take a cheap internet connection, we be cheaper on the long run.
